text: Congress will provide a legal guarantee for MSP (Minimum Support Price) for crops recommended by the Swaminathan Commission.
statusReason: Congress did not form government after 2024 elections. No legal guarantee for MSP enacted. BJP government maintains MSP is already at 50% above A2+FL costs but no legal backing.

text: Congress will conduct a nationwide Caste Census to ensure accurate data for social justice policies.
statusReason: Congress did not form government. No nationwide caste census announced by BJP government. Bihar conducted state-level caste survey in 2023. Karnataka announced plans in 2024.

text: Congress will remove the 50% cap on reservations and provide reservations based on population share.
statusReason: Congress did not form government. 50% cap on reservations (established by Supreme Court in Indra Sawhney case) remains in place. No constitutional amendment proposed.

text: Congress will provide Apprenticeship Programme (Pehli Naukri Pakki) to 1 crore youth annually with Rs 1 lakh per year.
summary: Apprenticeship for 1 crore youth with Rs 1 lakh/year (Pehli Naukri)
statusReason: Congress did not form government. BJP government launched PM Internship Scheme with Rs 5,000/month (Rs 60,000/year) instead, targeting 1 crore over 5 years (not annually).

text: Congress will provide Mahalakshmi scheme - Rs 1 lakh per year to one woman in every poor family.
summary: Rs 1 lakh/year to one woman per poor family (Mahalakshmi)
statusReason: Congress did not form government. Scheme not implemented nationally. Congress-ruled Karnataka implemented similar scheme (Gruha Lakshmi - Rs 2,000/month to women heads of households).

text: Congress will restore the old pension scheme for government employees.
summary: Restore Old Pension Scheme for government employees
statusReason: Congress did not form central government. However, Congress-ruled states (Rajasthan, Chhattisgarh, Himachal Pradesh before elections) restored OPS. Central government announced Unified Pension Scheme instead.

text: Congress will fill all 30 lakh vacant posts in Central and State governments within 1 year.
summary: Fill 30 lakh government vacancies within 1 year
statusReason: Congress did not form government. Central government vacancies remain significant. BJP government announced 10 lakh recruitment target (Rozgar Mela) but not all posts filled.

text: Congress will repeal the three new criminal laws (BNS, BNSS, BSA) and restore IPC, CrPC with reforms.
summary: Repeal new criminal laws (BNS, BNSS, BSA)
statusReason: Congress did not form government. New criminal laws (BNS, BNSS, BSA) came into effect on July 1, 2024. No repeal or rollback announced.

text: Congress will increase healthcare expenditure to 4% of GDP and provide universal healthcare.
summary: Increase healthcare spending to 4% of GDP
statusReason: Congress did not form government. Public health expenditure remains around 1.4% of GDP in 2024-25. No significant increase toward 4% target.

text: Congress will restore statehood to Jammu & Kashmir and conduct Assembly elections.
summary: Restore J&K statehood and hold Assembly elections
statusReason: Congress did not form central government. However, Supreme Court directed J&K Assembly elections by September 2024. Elections held in Sept-Oct 2024. Statehood restoration promised by Centre but not yet implemented.

evidence.title: Supreme Court Directive on J&K Elections
